short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic cookie clicker game available at any time in your chrome browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate productivity destroyer - the Cookie Clicker Chrome Extension! Get ready to embark on an addictive, sugar-filled adventure that will have you clicking your way to the top in no time.

This extension is designed to help you unwind and de-stress while boosting your productivity. With just one click, you'll be transported to a world of endless cookies, where you can click to your heart's content and watch as your cookie count climbs higher and higher.

But that's not all - the Cookie Clicker Chrome Extension also features a variety of exciting upgrades and power-ups to keep you engaged and motivated. Includes, but not limited to, grandmas who bake cookies for you automatically, so you'll never run out of ways to level up your cookie game.

And with a sleek and user-friendly interface, you can easily monitor your progress and compete with friends to see who can bake the most cookies in the shortest amount of time. So why wait? Download the Cookie Clicker Chrome Extension now and see just how many cookies you can bake!
